bny_mellon: BNY Mellon is a global investments company providing investment management, investment services and wealth management that help institutions and individuals succeed in markets all over the world. Stock Ticker is $BK.
northern_trust: Northern Trust is a leading provider of wealth management, asset servicing, asset management and banking to corporations, institutions, affluent families and individuals.
cullen_frost: CullenFrost Bankers, Inc. is a financial holding company, offering banking, investment, and insurance services to businesses and individuals in Texas.
truist: Truist Financial Corporation (previously Suntrust) is a purpose-driven financial services company offering a wide range of services including banking, lending, insurance, and wealth management. Stock Ticker is $TFC.
us_bank: U.S. Bank is a leading financial institution providing a wide array of products and services including banking, investment, mortgage, trust, and payment services.
associated_banccorp: Associated Banc-Corp is a regional bank holding company providing an extensive range of banking and financial services to businesses and individuals in the Midwest.
comerica: Comerica Incorporated is a financial services company with a focus on business banking and wealth management, serving clients in the U.S. and internationally.
keycorp: KeyCorp is one of the nation's largest bank-based financial services companies, providing retail and commercial banking, investment, and consumer finance services.
umb_financial: UMB Financial Corporation offers complete banking, asset management, health spending solutions and related financial services to both individual and business customers.
valley_national: Valley National Bancorp is a regional bank holding company offering a comprehensive suite of products and services including commercial, retail, insurance, and wealth management.
pnc: PNC Financial Services offers a wide range of services for all customers, from individuals and small businesses, to corporations and government entities.
capital_one: Capital One is a diversified bank that offers a broad array of financial products and services to consumers, small businesses and commercial clients. Stock Ticker is $COF.
citizens_bank: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. is an American bank headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, offering a wide range of retail and commercial banking products and services.
fifth_third: Fifth Third Bancorp is a diversified financial services company headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio. The Company operates four main businesses: Commercial Banking, Branch Banking, Consumer Lending, and Wealth & Asset Management. Stock Ticker is $FITB.
huntington_bank: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated is a regional bank holding company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, offering full-service commercial, small business, and consumer banking services.
regions_bank: Regions Financial Corporation is a member of the S&P 500 Index and is one of the nation's largest full-service providers of consumer and commercial banking, wealth management, and mortgage products and services.
cadence_bank: Cadence Bank provides a unique range of banking, financial and investment services to consumers, small businesses and corporations.
fnb: FNB Corporation is a diversified financial services company operating in seven states and the District of Columbia, offering a full range of consumer and business banking products.
simmons_bank: Simmons Bank is an Arkansas based financial company providing a wide range of banking services to personal and corporate clients.
bank_ozarks: Bank of the Ozarks, known for its community-focused banking, provides personalized financial solutions to individuals, families, and businesses.
ally_bank: Ally Financial Inc. is a digital financial services company offering financial products for consumers, businesses, automotive dealers, and corporate clients.
commerce_banc: Commerce Bancshares, Inc., operating as Commerce Bank, is a major banking and financial services company headquartered in Missouri. It offers a broad spectrum of banking services, including business and personal banking, wealth management, and investment services across a wide network of branches and ATMs in the Central United States. Known for its strong customer service and innovative banking solutions, Commerce Bank has established a significant presence in the financial industry, emphasizing community development and personal customer relationships.
bok_financial: BOK Financial Corporation is a top 25 U.S.-based financial services company providing a wide range of financial services to customers throughout the Midwest, Southwest, and Southeast.
mt_bank: M&T Bank Corporation is a financial holding company headquartered in Buffalo, New York, offering an extensive range of financial services to a broad client base.
old_national: Old National Bank is a regional bank with a strong commitment to community banking, offering personal and business banking services across the Midwest.
prosperity_bancshares: Prosperity Bancshares, Inc., a Texas-based regional financial holding company, provides a variety of financial products and services to small and medium-sized businesses and consumers.
amarillo_national: Amarillo National Bank, one of the largest family-owned banks in the United States, focuses on providing comprehensive banking services to individuals and businesses in Texas.
webster_financial: Webster Financial Corporation is a leading bank and financial services company in the Northeast, offering a wide range of banking, investment, and consumer finance services.
fulton_financial: Fulton Financial Corporation, based in Pennsylvania, offers a variety of financial services including banking, wealth management, and insurance through its subsidiary banks.
pinnacle_financial: Pinnacle Financial Partners provides a wide range of banking, investment, trust, mortgage, and insurance products and services designed for businesses and their owners and individuals interested in a comprehensive relationship with their financial institution.
doral_bank: Doral Bank, formerly a leading financial institution in Puerto Rico, offered a wide array of banking products and services before its closure in 2015.
tierone: TierOne Bank, which was based in Nebraska, provided various banking services to its customers before being closed and absorbed by Great Western Bank in 2010.
fcb: First Community Bank, known for its strong community banking services, offered personal and business banking solutions across its branches before its eventual merger or closure.
integra_bank: Integra Bank, once a prominent bank in the Midwest, offered comprehensive banking services ranging from personal banking to business and investment services before its closure in 2011.
superior_bank: Superior Bank was a full-service bank offering loans, deposits, and other banking services primarily in Alabama and Florida before its closure in 2011.
shorebank: ShoreBank was renowned for its commitment to social responsibility and community development banking in Chicago before its closure in 2010.
amcore_bank: Amcore Bank, N.A., provided a broad range of banking services in Illinois and Wisconsin, focusing on personal banking, business banking, and wealth management before its closure in 2010.
riverside_national_bank: Riverside National Bank of Florida offered a comprehensive suite of banking products tailored to the needs of individuals and businesses in Florida before its closure in 2010.
la_jolla_bank: La Jolla Bank, FSB, was a federal savings bank that provided banking and loan services in California, particularly known for real estate loans, before its closure.
first_regional_bank: First Regional Bank provided commercial banking services, including a variety of lending and deposit products in California before it was closed and assets were acquired by another bank.
park_avenue_bank: Park Avenue Bank offered personal and commercial banking services in New York, focusing on a personalized banking experience until its closure in 2010.
midwest_bank_and_trust: Midwest Bank and Trust Company served the Chicagoland area with a wide range of banking services, from personal to business banking solutions, until its closure in 2010.
allied_bank: Allied Bank, with a long history of serving Arkansas, offered comprehensive banking services, including personal, business, and agricultural banking, before its closure in 2016.
sun_west_bank: Sun West Bank provided personalized banking services, including loans and deposits, catering to individuals and businesses in Nevada before its closure.
community_central_bank: Community Central Bank focused on serving Michigan with a range of banking services designed for both individuals and businesses, emphasizing community involvement and personal service until its closure.
horizon_bank: Horizon Bank, a regional financial institution, offers comprehensive banking solutions to individuals and businesses across the Midwest. Known for its community engagement and customer-centric services, Horizon Bank provides a suite of products including checking and savings accounts, mortgage loans, and business financing, aiming to support the financial growth and wellbeing of its customers.
legacy_bank: Legacy Bank prides itself on a rich history of banking excellence, serving its community with a personal touch. As a trusted financial partner, it offers a wide range of banking services tailored to meet the needs of individuals, families, and businesses. With a focus on building lasting relationships, Legacy Bank combines traditional values with modern banking conveniences to ensure customer satisfaction and financial security.
nrb_chicago: The National Republic Bank of Chicago, once a prominent banking institution in the heart of Chicago, offered specialized banking services catering to both individual and corporate clients. Known for its commitment to customer service and community support, it provided various financial products designed to promote economic growth within the local community. Its legacy continues to influence the banking sector in Chicago.
